department: Public Works and Government Services Canada
short_summary: Trade Agreement: NONE   Tendering Procedures: All interested suppliers may submit a bid Competitive Procurement Strategy: N/A - P&A/LOI Only Comprehensive Land Claim Agreement: No Nature of Requirements: Request for Information (RFI)
description: Through this Request for Information (RFI), the Government of Canada is seeking the participation of industry, as well as First Nations, Inuit and Métis partners, in order to gain an understanding of the non-emergency towing and tug capacity within Canada.
